message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to own something that will greatly benefit you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can reach a more mutually beneficial agreement. I am willing to pay $105 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $115.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm glad we're getting closer. I would like to propose a price of $110 for the product.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $110. I'm willing to make another adjustment and sell it to you for $112.50.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in adjusting the price. I would like to counter with an offer of $110 for the product.
Thank you for your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment, but I need to be closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $114.
Hello Alice, I understand your position. I would like to propose an offer of $112 for the product.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $112. I'm willing to make one more adjustment and sell it to you for $116.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offers. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose an offer of $114 for the product.
